awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 3 nominations.

fullplot: A young man, morally destroyed by his parents not loving him and by the fear of being not capable to make his girlfriend happy, rises on the ledge of a building with the intention of committing suicide. A policeman makes every effort to argue him out of that.
plot: An unhappy man threatens suicide by standing on the ledge of a high-rise building for 14 hours.
title: Fourteen Hours
